title: My ping is good, fps good, so why is LoL still lagging?
body: So my ping is around 65-70, my fps is around 180 fps and yet every 5 or so seconds the game freezes and im lagging all over the joint. SOS

replies.body: hey bro we have a same problem but all i did was use WTFast to remove my lag if you know that try it out
